generalInfo:
Introduction

Sri Lanka - called “Serendib” - is the name that gave English speakers the word “serendipity.” One of the finest wildlife-watching destinations in the world is varied as the island itself; ranging from elephants, sloth bears and leopards to marine life and a vast number of different birds. Sri Lanka is regarded as one of the best places in the world to see whales, including the mighty Blue Whale. This small group wildlife adventure will take you around the island exposing you to some popular wildlife destinations and some lesser-known unique parks as well.



Tour Highlights

-Experience Sri Lanka’s Big 5: the Asian Elephant / Leopard / Sloth Bear / Blue Whale & Sperm Whale (whale watching season is from November to Mid-April)
-Enjoy 5 ( 3 sunset / 2 Dawn ) 4WD Jeep safaris to spot elephants, sloth bears, and leopards.
-Observe leopards and sloth bears during an early morning safari in ‘WIlpattu’ National Park.
-‘Yala’ National Park – home to the highest density of leopards in the world.
- Witness the Gathering of Elephants in Minneriya/Kaudulla National Parks or Hurulu Eco Park.
-Guaranteed sightings of large herds of Asian Elephants at the ‘Udawalawe’ National Park. Experience childish behaviour of elepant calves when bottle feeding of milk at Elephant Transit Home in Udawalawe.
-Camp out in style in the natural wilderness of the jungles and savor a special BBQ by a roaring campfire.
-Polonnaruwa - the Sri Lankan 12th century Kingdom, home to a --large monkey population which was famously featured in Disney’s engaging documentary film ‘Monkey Kingdom’.
-Guided night walks, sunset walks and a night drive.
-Services of some of the island’s best wildlife guides.
-Optional
Explore the waters off the southern coast – the best location in the world to spot Blue Whales (Season is from November to mid-April).

dayInfo.description: Arrival to Bandaranaike International Airport transfer to Negombo - Check in to the hotel - If you have a morning arrival, there will be plenty to do and explore - Overnight in Morning Star Resort (or similar hotel) in Negombo (hotel check-in time 2.00 p.m.)

After Breakfast, Transfer from Negombo to Wilpattu - We will make a few stops for lunch and nature / cultural encounters - Check in to the Tented Camp site - Sundown Walk - BBQ dinner at the Camp - Guided Night Walk after dinner - Overnight stay at Big Game Camp in Wilpattu

Leave for an early morning jeep safari in Wilpttu National Park. - Packed breakfast will be arranged - Back to the Camp and drive to Sigiriya - Visit Sigiriya Rock Fortress in the evening. - Overnight stay at Camellia Resort & Spa in Sigiriya

After an early breakfast, visit Pidurangala Rock and witness panoramic views including majestic Sigiriya Rock Fotress. - Back to hotel and drive to Polonnaruwa via Minneriya - Go for an afternoon safari drive in Minneriya National Park enroute ( or Kaudulla NP or Hurulu Eco Park depending on the movement of elephant herds) - Overnight stay at Hotel Mananuge in Polonnaruwa

Monkey Excursion in Polonnaruwa with Primate Research Assitants coupled with a visit to Polonnaruwa Historical Site. - Back to hotel and drive to Kandy. - Check in to the hotel. - Visit Kandy Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic, the most venerated place for Buddhists in Sri Lanka. - Overnight stay at Thilanka Hotel in Kandy.

Transfer to Kandy Railway Station for a Scenic Train Ride to Ella. - Meet your chauffeur at Ella Railway Station and drive to Ella Flower Garden Hotel. - Free evening at Ella - Dinner and overnight stay at Ella's Edge Resort

Visit Little Adam's Peak and Nine Arch Bridge in Ella after breakfast. - Drive to Udawalawe and be at Elephant Transit Home at 2.30pm to witness the bottle feeding of milk to elephant calves. - Then go for an afternoon jeep safari at Udawalawe National Park - Back to park entrance and transfer to Big Game Tented Safari Camp in Udawalawe - Post dinner night drive in the buffer zone of Udawalawe National Park.

Pre-breakfast Bird watching Trail in the camp vicinity with Camp Naturalist. - Drive to Yala after breakfast. - Check in at Big Game Tented Safari Campsite in Yala for Lunch. - Go for an evening safari drive in Yala National Park. - Enjoy a hearty BBQ dinner around campfire. - Night Trail in the camp vicinity to experience the noctural animals near you. - Overnight stay.

Off for a morning safari drive in Yala National Park and enjoy the wildlife at its best. - Back at the campsite - Sri Lankan Cooking Experience at the campsite with camp chef followed by lunch. - Free evening in Yala. Optional : Cultural Safari to Situlpawwa Ainceint Temple inside the Park - BBQ dinne and and overenight stay.

Drive to Galle after breakfast. - Visit Skanda Temple in Kataragama and particpate in "Pooja" Ceremony. - Continue to Galle and check in at Lady Hill Hotel. - Visit Galle Dutch Fort and witness the remains of the Colonial Architecture. - Dinner and overnight stay at Lady Hill Hotel in Galle
Go for a Whale Watching Boat Ride or having a Cinnamon experience depending on your visiting period. - Drive to Airport to connect with your departure flight.
